fields.name: date_time
fields.title: Date time
fields.description: date and time of start of averaged time period during which the horizontal particle flux was measured in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-mm-ddThh:mm:ss+00:00 [UTC]

fields.name: horizontal_particle_flux [#.m-2.s-1]
fields.title: Horizontal particle flux
fields.description: total snow particle flux during the one-minute interval corrected for wind speed [# m-2 s-1]
